docs.snippet: Despite the criticisms and fears swirling around the Games, they have begun, and for better or worse, Rio will have its moment....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite the criticisms and fears swirling around the Games, they have begun, and for better or worse, Rio will have its moment.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column discusses difficulties faced by Brazil in staging 2016 Olympics, which include dealing with polluted waters, high crime and political upheaval.

headline.main: For the Rio Olympic Games, There’s No Turning Back Now
headline.print_headline: For Better or Worse, the Show Must Go On

docs.snippet: The International Boxing Association decided to eliminate the guards for amateur male boxers, concluding that they did not prevent concussions....
docs.lead_paragraph: The International Boxing Association decided to eliminate the guards for amateur male boxers, concluding that they did not prevent concussions.
docs.abstract: Male boxers competing in Rio Olympics will do so without protective headgear for first time based on argument that they will be safer without it; several studies, including one commissioned by International Boxing Assn, argue that number of acute brain injuries actually declined when head guards were not in use; critics of decision say findings are suspect, and decision has more to do with drawing in fans than keeping boxers safe.

headline.main: Making Olympic Boxing Safer by Eliminating Head Guards

docs.snippet: Virginia Thrasher went through a three-week spring whirlwind, winning three NCAA titles and a spot on the U.S. Olympic Shooting team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia Thrasher went through a three-week spring whirlwind, winning three NCAA titles and a spot on the U.S. Olympic Shooting team.

headline.main: First Gold Medal in Rio Goes to US Shooter Virginia Thrasher
headline.print_headline: First Gold Medal in Rio Goes to US Shooter Virginia Thrasher

docs.snippet: The Olympics began in full with the first gold medal going to an American teenager by the fearsome name of Thrasher. There was plenty of rough riding on a punishing cycling course, a smooth opener for Kevin Durant and company, and a difficult loss...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Olympics began in full with the first gold medal going to an American teenager by the fearsome name of Thrasher. There was plenty of rough riding on a punishing cycling course, a smooth opener for Kevin Durant and company, and a difficult loss for Venus Williams.

headline.main: Games Begin in Full, With US Teen on Target for 1st Gold
headline.print_headline: Games Begin in Full, With US Teen on Target for 1st Gold

docs.snippet: Glasgow Rangers ended their four-year exile from the Scottish Premier League with a disappointing 1-1 draw against Hamilton Academical at Ibrox on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Glasgow Rangers ended their four-year exile from the Scottish Premier League with a disappointing 1-1 draw against Hamilton Academical at Ibrox on Saturday.

headline.main: Rangers Rescue Draw on Scottish Premier League Return
headline.print_headline: Rangers Rescue Draw on Scottish Premier League Return

docs.snippet: The Israeli and Lebanese Olympics teams became involved in a heated argument about access to a bus to the opening ceremony of the Rio de Janeiro Games....

docs.snippet: Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti acknowledged Saturday that the results of November's U.S. presidential election could weigh heavily on his city's chances of hosting the 2024 Olympics, saying that a victory by Donald Trump could turn off IOC voters...
docs.lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti acknowledged Saturday that the results of November's U.S. presidential election could weigh heavily on his city's chances of hosting the 2024 Olympics, saying that a victory by Donald Trump could turn off IOC voters.

headline.main: LA Mayor: Trump Victory Could Turn Off IOC Voters to '24 Bid
headline.print_headline: LA Mayor: Trump Victory Could Turn Off IOC Voters to '24 Bid

headline.main: Substitute Rio Lighter Had Hour's Notice After Pele Withdrew
headline.print_headline: Substitute Rio Lighter Had Hour's Notice After Pele Withdrew

docs.snippet: A Brazilian star tries to lift the weight off his nation’s soccer soul and the dreams of his old neighborhood....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Brazilian star tries to lift the weight off his nation’s soccer soul and the dreams of his old neighborhood.
docs.abstract: Profile of Brazilian soccer star Neymar, who hopes to restore country's reputation as soccer powerhouse at 2016 Olympics; Neymar is also working hard to resuscitate his childhood neighborhood in city of Praia Grande, which is troubled by drugs, prostitution and lack of good schools and jobs.

headline.main: On Field and in Hometown, Neymar Tries to Change the Narrative

docs.snippet: Andrew Bogut wanted one more shot to represent Australia at the Olympics and wasn't going to let an injury take that away again....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andrew Bogut wanted one more shot to represent Australia at the Olympics and wasn't going to let an injury take that away again.

headline.main: Andrew Bogut Dominant in Unexpected Return for Rio Games
